author: malbouis
body:
#### PR description:

This is an update of AlCaRecoTriggerBitsRcdRead.cc in order to move from legacy module edm::EDAnalyzer to `edm::one::EDAnalyzer`.

#### PR validation:

It compiles.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

title: [AlCa] Move away from edm::EDAnalyzer LegacyModule in AlCaRecoTriggerBitsRcdRead
